TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_qmayah, title = qmayah, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/qmayah} }

S.FORM: == qmayah == sraral ga, pmhyan ta' pagay qu slaq ta'. misu qani lga, pmuhyan ta' rramat ru bebway la. yaya mu lokah musa qmayah muhi' ramat.
== qmayah == sraral ga, pmhyan ta' pagay qo slaq ta'. miso qani lga, pmohyan ta' rramat ro bebway la. yaya mo lokah mosa qmayah mohi' ramat.
